mapper.delete: DELETE FROM likes WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND goods_id = #{goodsId}
mapper.select: SELECT g.id AS goodsId, g.name, g.category, g.brand, g.price, g.salePercent, g.description, g.img, g.likes, g.status, g.created_at, g.updated_at, l.liked_at FROM likes l JOIN goods g ON l.goods_id = g.id WHERE l.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY l.liked_at DESC
